alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 05 at 7:12PM AKST until December 06 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Kodiak Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong northwest winds with gusts to 75 mph are occurring around Kodiak City this evening. As of 7pm AKST, the gusts are peaking in intensity and will likely persist through midnight or very early Wednesday morning. These winds are then expected to slowly diminish through the day Wednesday.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
